69#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER 0
70#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEGMENT A
71
72//******************************************************************************
73//
75//
76//******************************************************************************
77#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEG2(X) AM_HAL_CTIMER_TIMER ## X
78#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEG1(X) AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEG2(X)
79#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_TIMERX AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEG1(AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEGMENT)
80
81#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_INT2(SEG, NUM) AM_HAL_CTIMER_INT_TIMER ## SEG ## NUM
82#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_INT1(SEG, NUM) AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_INT2(SEG, NUM)
83#define AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_INT \
84 AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_INT1(AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER_SEGMENT, AM_HAL_ENTROPY_CTIMER)
